intro: Beilschmiedia ugandensis, commonly known as the Uganda beilschmiedia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Lauraceae. It is native to the tropical rainforests of Uganda and is characterized by its evergreen foliage and small, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its leaves are革质 (leathery) and dark green, while its flowers are white or pale yellow, often fragrant. The fruit is a small, spherical drupe that contains a single seed.
